casename: Sincere Watch Limited v Bakery Mart Pte Ltd (Ng Yew Hong, Third Party)
counsel: Roland Tong (Wong Tan & Molly Lim LLC) for the judgment creditor; Ng Yeow Khoon (Shook Lin & Bok) for the judgment debtor; Ismail Atan (Gabriel Peter & Partners) for the garnishee.
